Package at.qe.g1t2.restapi.controller

package at.qe.g1t2.restapi.controller
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AccessPointConnectionController
    This is a Java class that serves as a REST controller for handling HTTP requests related to access points.
    AccessPointRegisterController
    This REST-Interface provides method for new AccessPoints to register themselves.
    AccessPointRegisterControllerTest
     
    ChartController
    This class provides the data which will be display in the graphs on the Webpage
    ChartControllerTest
     
    FileUploadController
    This class handles uploading Pictures for the visitor and gardener
    FileUploadControllerTest
     
    QRCodeRestController
    This class returns the QR-Code used to access the visitor page of the given sensorstation
    SensorDataController
    This class provides a REST-interface for the accessPoints to send data from the sensorstations to the webserver
    SensorDataControllerTest
     
    SensorStationConnectController
    This class handles the connection and coupling of the sensorStation and the Webserver Each action on the connection of the SensorStation is logged Valid checks if all NotNull attributes of the DTOs have a value otherwise it throws an exception
